DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore quality life related factor patient major depressive disorder . This study adopt cross-sectional research design . Purposive sampling use collect data 120 patient come psychiatric outpatient department medical center psychiatric hospital northern Taiwan . Data collect structured questionnaire , included： ( 1 ) demographic data sheet , ( 2 ) 5-item Brief Symptom Rating Scale ( BSRS-5 ) , ( 3 ) Center For Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale ( CES-D ) , ( 4 ) Inventory Socially Supportive Behaviors ( ISSB ) , ( 5 ) World Health Organization ’ Questionnaire Quality Life：BREF-Taiwan Version 100 ( WHOQOL-BREF ) . Data analyze use SPSS/Windows 10.0 statistical software . The descriptive statistic method include frequency distribution , arithmetic mean , standard deviation , percentage . Data analyze use independent t-test , Pearson ’ product-moment correlation , one way ANOVA stepwise multiple regression , examine demographic , degree depression , social support link quality life . Through research , find follow results： 1.The condition major depressive disorder patient ’ quality life score range subtitle 4-20 . A sum follow subtitles：physical domain 11.54 , psychological domain 10.46 , social domain 11.61 environmental domain 12.82 . The quality life result higher environmental domain , poor psychological domain . 2 . The result quality life related demographic , degree depression , social support followed： 1 . Physical domain：the independent variable significant linear correlation age , age early-onset , type occupation , live arrangement , economic status , health status , degree depression emotional support . 2 . Psychological domain：the independent variable significant linear correlation age , age early-onset , type occupation , live arrangement , economic status , health status , degree depression , sum social support , emotional support , instrumental support , informational appraisal support . 3 . Social domain：the independent variable significant linear correlation age , age early-onset , marital status , type occupation , economic status , health status , degree depression , sum social support , emotional support , instrumental support , informational appraisal support . 4 . Environmental domain：the independent variable significant linear correlation age , age early-onset , marital status , economic status , degree depression , sum social support emotional support . 3.The best stepwise regression model predict major depressive disorder patient ’ quality life followed： 1 . Physical domain：the best predict factor degree depression , account explain 60.30﹪of variance . 2 . Psychological domain：the best predict factor degree depression , sum social support , age early-onset , age 71 year old , account explain 76.50﹪of variance . 3 . Social domain：the best predict factor degree depression , age early-onset , informational appraisal support , unemployment age 71 year old , account explain 53.80﹪of variance . 4 . Environmental domain：the best predict factor degree depression , income le one hundred thousand , income one hundred ten thousand 71 year old , account explain 53.50﹪of variance . The result study could understand major depressive disorder patient ’ quality life condition provide relate research future , develop local data health administration reference foundation .
DOC.brief_title: Quality Life Its Related Factors Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
